mapper.sql: id, category_code, category_property_name,select_flag, show_order, category_property_description, create_date, create_user, last_update_date, last_update_user
mapper.delete: delete mms_product_category_property,mms_product_category_property_value from mms_product_category_property left join mms_product_category_property_value on mms_product_category_property.id = mms_product_category_property_value.category_property_id where mms_product_category_property.category_code = #{categoryCode}
mapper.insert: insert into mms_product_category_property ( category_code, select_flag, category_property_name, show_order, category_property_description, create_date, create_user, last_update_date, last_update_user) values ( #{productCategory.categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryPropertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryPropertyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
